person.persName: Madison Conyers Johnson (Leading KY attorney and brother of Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson)

body.p: Born in Scott County, Kentucky, son of William Johnson and Betsy Payne. Brother of Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson. Graduated from Transylvania University in 1823. Admitted to the bar in 1825. A prominent Lexington, Kentucky attorney for over 40 years. Member of Lexington City Council. President of the Northern Bank of Kentucky's main branch in Lexington.
